questions.question: Why is backing up data files important?
content: If the information is damaged it can be recovered
In case you forget where files are located
To prevent documents from being stolen

questions.question: When constructing a password you should
content: Use your family member name, sports name, pet name and add a number on the end
Use phrases or misspelled words with embedded numbers and special characters
Use a sequence of letters and numbers from your keyboard such as QWERTY

questions.question: Which of the following is an example of a phishing attack
content: Sending an email with a malicious link that seems like its originating from a friend or coworker
Creating a fake website identical to a real website in order to trick users into entering credentials
Sending a text with a malicious stating that you won a contest

questions.question: What does the https:// at the beginning of a URL denote, as opposed to http:// (without the s)?
content: The site is not available from certain computers
The information entered into the site is encrypted
The site is up to date

questions.question: A group of computers which are controlled remotely for malicious purposes are called
Which of the following is an example of two-factor or two-step authentication
content: One time code sent to email or phone

questions.question: What does a VPN do?
content: Protects your traffic from people snooping on the network

questions.question: All of the following are considered threats except:

A virus is a _______ issue:
Which of the following allows a website to store information about a user on their computer?
What is Malware?
A program that collects sensitive information, disrupts computer use, or gains unauthorized access is called:
Malware that restrict access to files or the entire computer system until the user performs a requested action is called:
A standalone malicious computer program that automatically propagates over a network is called?
What is adware?
content: Malicious program that spreads throughout a network automatically
Malicious information that collects info about users without their knowledge

questions.question: Malicious software that collects info about users without their knowledge is called:

Phishing scams targeting a specific group of people is called:
